description: Beyond the pain and anguish, Covid-19 taught SIA how to be agile and resilient, says chief executive Goh Choon Phong. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Exclusive interview with SIA CEO: How the national carrier powered through the Covid-19 pandemic
title_page: Exclusive interview with SIA CEO: How the national carrier powered through the Covid-19 pandemic | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE - When The Straits Times met Singapore Airlines (SIA) chief executive Goh Choon Phong last week for an exclusive interview, he was looking a lot happier and more relaxed than he has been in two years.
And why not?
